hiveArticle.title: ColorChallenge - Thursday Green - A Festival Light
hiveArticle.body:
My entry for today's #colorchallenge is a festival light. Today we are celebrating Diwali here in India where you will see all the streets lighted up.

<hr>

A Festival Light
